) } } AssetDetails.propTypes = { assets: PropTypes.array.isRequired, asset: PropTypes.object.isRequired, errors: PropTypes.object.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => { let id = ownProps.match.params.id; console.log(state.assets.assets) return { asset: state.assets.assets.data.find(asset => asset._id === id) } }; export default connect( mapStateToProps, { } )(AssetDetails)
